response.overview: Dir. Jeff Meyer  1989  Jason (Jeff Meyer) is a photographer whose career has hit a really rough patch. He wants to make the transition from commercial photography to art photography. In the meantime, he is living and dreaming (and rapidly running out of money) on a houseboat. He has been hoping that he will be able to get grant money to pursue his dream, but time is running out. He meets a really beautiful woman, Amanda (Gail Kappler Rosella), and gets to photograph her and fall in love with her.
response.title: Amanda
